creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: left print: two actors in center; one actor dressed as a woman with ornate kimono and headdress clutches kimono with PL hand and looks toward PL; actor at bottom has shadow of a moustache and wears a kimono decorated with morning glories; sword under PL hand; actor reels back thrusting PL hand in front; background with cartouches, flowers
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: Upper right, center sheet: [ 歌川国梅 ]
title: Left sheet of a kabuki triptych
